Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Aerococcus viridans (MIC=1.25-2.5 µM), Micrococcus luteus (MIC=2.5-5 µM), Bacillus megaterium (MIC=2.5-5 µM), Enterococcus fecalis (MIC>20 µM), Saphylococcus aureus (MIC>20 µM);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli 363 (MIC>40 µM), Vibrio vulnificus (MIC>20 µM), Salmonella thyphimurium (MIC>20 µM), Klebsiella pneumoniae (MIC>20 µM).Fungi:Fusarium oxysporum (MIC=5-10 µM), Botrytis cinerea (MIC=5-10 µM), Neurospora crassa (MIC=2.5-5 µM), Aspergillus fumigatus (MIC>20 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial and antifungal activity. Presents chitin-binding activity (By similarity).

Literature.Title: Diversity of the penaeidin antimicrobial peptides in two shrimp species.
Literature.Author: Cuthbertson BJ, Shepard EF, Chapman RW, Gross PS.

Literature.Title: Recombinant expression and range of activity of penaeidins, antimicrobial peptides from penaeid shrimp.
Literature.Author: Destoumieux D, Bulet P, Strub JM, Van Dorsselaer A, Bachère E.
